医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
克里斯蒂为癌症护理医生推出独特的培训计划曼彻斯特克里斯蒂国际癌症护理卓越中心正在为新一代癌症护理医生提供独特的培训计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/The-Christie-launches-unique-training-program-for-cancer-care-doctors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/The-Christie-launches-unique-training-program-for-cancer-care-doctors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af04a088-b5bc-4a9c-b61c-bb3a09b849b0 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 23:14:00 -0500 The Christie launches unique training program for cancer care doctors
Grifols 获得早期帕金森病生物标志物发现资助全球医疗保健公司和血浆衍生药物的领先生产商 Grifols 今天宣布，该公司已获得迈克尔·J·福克斯帕金森氏症研究基金会 (MJFF) 的资助，用于识别基于血浆的生物标志物，这些生物标志物可以表明一个人患帕金森氏症的可能性疾病（PD）在临床诊断之前很多年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Grifols-receives-grant-for-early-Parkinsons-disease-biomarker-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Grifols-receives-grant-for-early-Parkinsons-disease-biomarker-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56492a9a-5735-46e2-9446-22ca15484480 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 23:08:00 -0500 Grifols receives grant for early Parkinson's disease biomarker discovery
Pheno Therapeutics 获得新型多发性硬化症治疗药物的临床试验授权Pheno Therapeutics Limited 是一家专注于发现和开发用于治疗神经系统疾病的小分子疗法的生物技术公司，今天宣布其已获得英国 MHRA（药品和保健品监管机构）的临床试验授权 (CTA)。主要候选人，PTD802。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Pheno-Therapeutics-receives-clinical-trial-authorization-for-novel-multiple-sclerosis-therapeutic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Pheno-Therapeutics-receives-clinical-trial-authorization-for-novel-multiple-sclerosis-therapeutic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6e3207a-c550-40ae-b45d-f00cfaacf866 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 23:06:00 -0500 Pheno Therapeutics receives clinical trial authorization for novel multiple sclerosis therapeutic
Panakeia 推出人工智能驱动的 PANProfiler Colon，用于快速癌症分析Panakeia（“公司”）是人工智能驱动的多组学生物标志物分析领域的先驱，今天宣布推出 PANProfiler Colon，这是一款人工智能驱动的软件解决方案，用于完全分析微卫星不稳定性 (MSI) 和错配修复缺陷 (dMMR)直接从结肠癌组织样本的苏木精和伊红 (H&E) 染色图像中进行数字化处理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Panakeia-launches-AI-driven-PANProfiler-Colon-for-rapid-cancer-profiling.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Panakeia-launches-AI-driven-PANProfiler-Colon-for-rapid-cancer-profiling.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9aacf678-2bf3-411c-bad4-631726d887f8 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 23:01:00 -0500 Panakeia launches AI-driven PANProfiler Colon for rapid cancer profiling
全球委员会提出肥胖诊断和治疗的新框架一个全球委员会在《柳叶刀糖尿病与内分泌学》上发表文章，并得到了全球 75 个医疗组织的认可，该委员会提出了一种新颖、细致的肥胖诊断方法，该方法基于除体重指数 (BMI) 之外的其他体内多余脂肪测量指标，以及个人健康状况不佳的客观体征和症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Global-Commission-proposes-new-framework-for-obesity-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Global-Commission-proposes-new-framework-for-obesity-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db56e06c-4ca8-4fc1-934a-e3721917bf1c Wed, 15 Jan 2025 22:58:00 -0500 Global Commission proposes new framework for obesity diagnosis and treatment
Sapio Sciences 推出化学、分子生物学、GMP 工作流程和免疫原性的新工具Science-aware™ 实验室信息学平台 Sapio Sciences 今天宣布推出 24.12 版，推出用于化学、分子生物学、GMP 工作流程和免疫原性的新工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Sapio-Sciences-introduces-new-tools-for-chemistry-molecular-biology-GMP-workflows-and-immunogenicity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Sapio-Sciences-introduces-new-tools-for-chemistry-molecular-biology-GMP-workflows-and-immunogenicity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62cde194-f1d4-4c0a-9cd5-e2925afcafc0 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 22:50:00 -0500 Sapio Sciences introduces new tools for chemistry, molecular biology, GMP workflows, and immunogenicity
士兵中尼古丁袋的使用率明显高于平民根据对美国最大军事基地自由堡军事人员的一项调查，美国士兵使用可导致严重健康问题的尼古丁袋的可能性是普通美国成年人的 10 倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Nicotine-pouch-use-among-soldiers-significantly-higher-than-civilians.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Nicotine-pouch-use-among-soldiers-significantly-higher-than-civilians.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=529c690e-2b82-4293-961f-3c9f9fd0b628 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 22:11:00 -0500 Nicotine pouch use among soldiers significantly higher than civilians
麦克马斯特大学的研究人员发现了与严重哮喘相关的关键免疫细胞麦克马斯特大学的研究人员在哮喘研究领域取得了一项重要发现，确定了一种新的免疫细胞群，它们可能在哮喘症状的严重程度中发挥着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/McMaster-researchers-identify-key-immune-cells-linked-to-severe-asthma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/McMaster-researchers-identify-key-immune-cells-linked-to-severe-asthma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3abf820-8e58-466a-82ee-4fbb65376e7b Wed, 15 Jan 2025 22:08:00 -0500 McMaster researchers identify key immune cells linked to severe asthma
吃大量红肉可能会增加患痴呆症的风险食用红肉是慢性疾病（包括心血管疾病和 2 型糖尿病）的既定危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Eating-greater-quantities-of-red-meat-may-increase-risk-of-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Eating-greater-quantities-of-red-meat-may-increase-risk-of-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7c7fdd4-3861-4c5d-8975-4c9122c4dfc8 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 22:03:00 -0500 Eating greater quantities of red meat may increase risk of dementia
确定潜在结直肠癌治疗的新靶点结直肠癌 (CRC) 是一种始于结肠（大肠）或直肠（消化系统的一部分）的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/New-target-identified-for-pottial-colorectal-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/New-target-identified-for-pottial-colorectal-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=812d2e14-3bc6-4aca-b039-e9c2c048cc2b Wed, 15 Jan 2025 21:58:00 -0500 New target identified for potential colorectal cancer treatment
